title: Sefer Digambara Pulkhanim Ha'yehudi: Book of Ascetic Nudity Rituals of the Jew
description: Written through an eastern mindfulness about the nature and workings of life and of religion, this book of rituals is sure to challenge the most devout to the most unfamiliar. Digambara Pulkhanim ha'Yehudi is a ritual practice that is grounded in Jewish religious tradition. It is a clothes-free expression of Judaism, that promotes the continuing renewal of Jewish religious practice through ascetic ritual behavior and lifestyle. Though written for individual study and practice, this book covers community rituals, as well, and provides an enlightening view into the world of religious nudism and community ritual. A must read for those embracing or seeking to embrace a religious path of ritual nudity.
author: Joseph Tsefanyahu Farkasdi
